comprehensive_overview: Boost.MPI is a peer-reviewed, free, open-source, portable, and fully-standard library implementation of the Message Passing Interface (MPI) for C++.
core_features: Boost.MPI provides an intuitive C++ interface for MPI operations, allowing for seamless integration of parallelism into C++ applications. It offers support for point-to-point and collective communication, synchronizations, and parallel computational operations.
